title: Delayed League Client
body:
Everything I do in the client, it's delayed by like 10 seconds. 

I create a lobby and it takes 10 - 20 seconds to create it and half the time it doesn't even create one, it just says something like "Something unexpected has occurred while creating this lobby".

Once I do go create a lobby and find a game, most of the time I can't choose a champion because it's so delayed.

EVERYTHING IS DELAYED AND IT'S REALLY ANNOYING.

In game, it's perfectly fine.

I have pretty good internet speeds (100 DOWN, 40 UP) but I don't know what's going on.

Please help.
